entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:14 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 07:14 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
